reviewText: I bought this for my son, who is a high school wrestler. Dan Gable's the best- He's a great teacher. We learned a lot. Thanks!
Excellent. Brought my sons game up tremendously.
For wrestlers, their parents, and coaches, this is the best DVD that I've watched, paused, rewound, and watched again.  Cannot say enough for the quality of instructional material on this DVD.

02/15/12 I know nothing about wrestling but purchased the DVD for a 17 year old young man who has faced LOTS of failures in life, except for wrestling in high school.  He watched the DVD prior to some competitive matches and even made it to STATE this year.  I can only assume that Dan Gable's training message in the DVD helped this young man gain some confidence.

This is a great instructional DVD, not only for wrestlers but for fans. I learned a lot from listening to Dan Gable's explanations and watching the demonstrations by the Zadick brothers. What I learned from the DVD has made watching wrestling matches even more enjoyable.
